0.1.name: wordpress/whosamungus-whos-amung-us
0.1.description:
This is a plugin that will allow you to setup and manage your whos.amung.us stats very easily: * With just a few clicks you can setup the plugin and it's widget and test the various displaying options to find which suits your website better! * View stats inside your wordpress instaltation - You will be able to view live stats about your website insider your wordpress instalation

This plugin was developed by Miguel Pinho. Visit Whos.Amung.us and get Real-time stats for your website or blog!
